name: Gift_of_Defense
display_help: You received this holiday gift. Who knows what could be inside.
display_target_help: You received the Gift of Defense. Your Defense is now greatly increased.
display_victim_hit: You receive the Gift of Defense. Your Defense is now greatly increased.

name: Gift_of_Life
display_help: You received this holiday gift. Who knows what could be inside.
display_target_help: You received the Gift of Life and some of your health is restored.
display_victim_hit: You receive the Gift of Life and some of your health is restored.

name: Gift_of_Power
display_help: You received this holiday gift. Who knows what could be inside.
display_target_help: You received the Gift of Power and you now strike with a lot more damage.
display_victim_hit: You receive the Gift of Power and you now strike with a lot more damage.

name: Gift_of_Energy
display_help: You received this holiday gift. Who knows what could be inside.
display_target_help: You received the Gift of Energy and gain a lot of Endurance.
display_victim_hit: You receive the Gift of Energy and gain a lot of Endurance.

name: Gift_of_Experience
display_help: You received this holiday gift. Who knows what could be inside.
display_target_help: You received the Gift of Experience. You will not accrue any XP Debt if you are defeated. This protection will last for 1 hour or until you are defeated.
display_victim_hit: You receive the Gift of Experience. You will not accrue any XP Debt if you are defeated. This protection will last for 1 hour or until you are defeated.

name: Lump_of_Coal
display_help: You received this holiday gift. Who knows what could be inside.
display_target_help: You were bad this last year. You got a lump of coal and nothing else.
display_victim_hit: You were bad this last year. You got a lump of coal and nothing else.

name: Phenomenal_Luck
display_help: Boosts your Defense to all attacks by 33% for 60 seconds.
display_target_help: Boosts your Defense to all attacks by 33% for 60 seconds.
display_attacker_hit: You now have {PowerName} and greatly increase your Defense.

name: Robust
display_help: Increases all your Damage Resistance by 20% for 60 seconds. Robust also protects you from enemy Teleportation.
display_attacker_hit: You are Robust and take a lot less damage from attacks and can resist enemy Teleportation.

name: Uncanny_Insight
display_help: Makes your attacks 37.5% more accurate and increases your Perception by 50% for 60 seconds.
display_target_help: Makes your attacks 37.5% more accurate and increases your Perception by 50% for 60 seconds.
display_attacker_hit: You have {PowerName} into your enemies' weakness and greatly increase your chance To Hit and your Perception.

display_attacker_hit: You are filled with {PowerName} and strike with a lot more damage.

name: Iron_Will

name: Escape
display_help: Frees you from many Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Fear, Confuse and KnockBack effects and boosts your resistance to Repel, Taunt and Placate effects for 90 seconds. This Inspiration can be used even while under such effects.
display_target_help: Frees you from many Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Fear, Confuse and KnockBack effects and boosts your resistance to Repel, Taunt and Placate effects for 90 seconds. This Inspiration can be used even while under such effects.
display_attacker_hit: You are now able to Escape from most effects.

name: Restoration
display_help: If you are defeated, you can wake up with 3/4 of your hit points. You will, however, have no Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for 10 seconds. Unlike weaker inspirations, Restoration will not leave you Disoriented, and you will be protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds.
display_target_help: You have been Restored. You cannot recovery Endurance for a while, but you are protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds.
display_attacker_hit: Your miraculous {PowerName} saves you from the brink of death. You feel a little weak and cannot do anything for a short while.

name: Superior_Health_Imbuement
display_help: All nearby teammates instantly recover 50% of their Health.
display_target_help: All nearby teammates instantly recover 50% of their Health.
display_attacker_hit: You and your teammates recover 50% of their Health.

name: Righteous_Rage_Imbuement
display_help: Boosts the damage of all teammates by 50% for 1 minute.
display_target_help: Boosts the damage of all teammates by 50% for 1 minute.
display_attacker_hit: You use your {PowerName} Inspiration to boost the damage of your team by a large amount for a short time.

name: Superior_Protection_Imbuement
display_help: Frees you and your nearby teammates from many Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Fear, Confuse and KnockBack effects and boosts your resistance to Repel, Taunt and Placate effects for 3 minutes. This Inspiration can be used even while under such effects.
display_target_help: Frees you and your nearby teammates from many Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Fear, Confuse and KnockBack effects and boosts your resistance to Repel, Taunt and Placate effects for 3 minutes. This Inspiration can be used even while under such effects.
display_attacker_hit: You and your team are able to resist most status effects for a long time.

name: Refreshing_Imbuement
display_help: This inspiration immediately restores 37.5% of your team's health and endurance.
display_target_help: This inspiration immediately restores 37.5% of your team's health and endurance.
display_attacker_hit: You use your {PowerName} Inspiration, and your nearby teammates gain a large amount of Endurance and Health.

name: Impenetrable_Imbuement
display_help: Boosts your nearby teammates' Defense to all attacks by 24.75%, Resistance to all damage by 15% and grants resistance to teleportation for 1 minute.
display_target_help: Boosts your nearby teammates' Defense to all attacks by 24.75%, Resistance to all damage by 15% and grants resistance to teleportation for 1 minute.
display_attacker_hit: You use your {PowerName} Inspiration, and your nearby teammates gain a large bonus to your defense and resistance for a short time.

name: Intuition_Imbuement
display_help: Boosts your nearby teammates' chance to hit by 28.12%, your damage by 37.5% and increases your Perception by 50% for 1 minute.
display_short_help: +28.12% To Hit, +37.5% Damage, +50% Perception to Team
display_target_help: Boosts your nearby teammates' chance to hit by 28.12%, your damage by 37.5% and increases your Perception by 50% for 1 minute.
display_target_short_help: +28.12% To Hit, +37.5% Damage, +50% Perception to Team
display_attacker_hit: You use your {PowerName} Inspiration and boost your teammates' damage, chance to hit and perception greatly for a short time.
